ada hawasa onna mama panthi gihin awith poddak yaluwekge gewal paththata giya tikak katha karanna kiyala.yanakota ethana thawa set ekak innawa.unge wade mawama kanna hadanawa.magen illannema pati ekak.apw ewun hithagena inne mama me sira job ekak karanawa kiyala.kiwwata piliganneth naha.barima thana mama kiwwa mata job ekak set wuna gaman ubalata denawa supiri parti ekak kiyala.ethakota ethana inna thawa ekak kiyanawa dan kawadada oya kiyana job eka hamba wenne kiyala.dan ithin dipanko uththara.mataneda ithin age malu gage natanne oya welawata thamayi.mamath ithin lokayane poddak shep wela kata wahagena unge kathawalata boruwata hina wewi hitiya.
